solution_line_template: A pound of coffee makes {cups_per_pound} cups of coffee, so {pounds_of_coffee} lbs. coffee * {cups_per_pound} cups of coffee per lb. = <<{pounds_of_coffee}*{cups_per_pound}={total_cups}>>{total_cups} cups of coffee.

Angie drinks {cups_per_day} cups of coffee a day, so she has enough coffee to last her {total_cups} cups of coffee / {cups_per_day} cups of coffee per day = <<{total_cups}/{cups_per_day}={days}>>{days} days
